On this fascinating journey you will explore the caves where the early 
Buddhist masters achieved enlightenment, enter the monasteries where 
the early Dalai Lamas and the founders of Buddhism meditated and 
taught, and - at an altitude of over 16,000 feet - look into the 
remarkable Oracle Lake where every Dalai Lama has had prophetic 
visions.
